attributes.action: Make the Friday before August Bank Holiday a half-working day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So many people are away from work on holiday at this time of year that a half a day taken from Friday would not make a difference.
Traffic is notorious on the Friday before any Bank Holiday so this would ease evening congestion when holidaymakers mix with commuter traffic by being able to stagger journeys.
The loss of economic output would be minimal but the benefits, including the general wellbeing and feel-good factor are undeniable.
I therefore petition the Prime Minister to bring about a proper debate on the subject.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
